detaileddescription.para: Total number of bytes for IntRead
Pointer to the data for IntRead

memberdef.name: I2C0_CONFIG
memberdef.initializer: = { .pullSelect = kPORT_PullDisable, .slewRate = kPORT_SlowSlewRate, .passiveFilterEnable = kPORT_PassiveFilterDisable, .openDrainEnable = kPORT_OpenDrainEnable, .driveStrength = kPORT_LowDriveStrength, .mux = kPORT_MuxAlt5, .lockRegister = kPORT_UnlockRegister }

briefdescription.para: Sets up the I2C before first use.

parameterdescription.para: is a structure containing the operating conditions for the module.

simplesect.para: BOOL - TRUE if the I2C module was successfully initialized.

briefdescription.para: Waits for the acknowledgment from the slave device.
Check and clear the arbitration flag.
Write a byte of data to a specified register.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t registerAddress, uint8_t *const data, const uint8_t nbBytes)
memberdef.name: I2C_PollRead

briefdescription.para: Reads data of a specified length starting from a specified register.

detaileddescription.para:
Uses polling as the method of data reception.
registerAddress
The register address.
data
A pointer to store the bytes that are read.
nbBytes
The number of bytes to read.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t registerAddress, uint8_t *const data, const uint8_t nbBytes)
memberdef.name: I2C_IntRead

briefdescription.para: Reads data of a specified length starting from a specified register.

detaileddescription.para:
Uses interrupts as the method of data reception.
registerAddress
The register address.
data
A pointer to store the bytes that are read.
nbBytes
The number of bytes to read.

briefdescription.para: I/O routines for the K70 I2C interface.

detaileddescription.para: This contains the functions for operating the I2C (inter-integrated circuit) module.
